company.title: About the Company
company.description: Our company has been successfully operating in the real estate market for over 15 years, completing more than 25 projects and building over 500,000 m² of residential and commercial properties.

news.title: Sales Launch in the New SKYLINE Project
news.description: We are excited to announce the start of sales in the new SKYLINE residential complex located in the heart of the city.

news.title: EliteBuild Awarded 'Developer of the Year'
news.description: Our company has been recognized as the top developer in the region for this year.

news.title: GREEN YARD Construction Completed
news.description: The GREEN YARD project is now finished. Over 250 families have received keys to their new homes.

about.title: About the Company
about.description1: Murad Buildings has been a leader in Uzbekistan's construction industry for over 20 years. We create modern residential complexes combining comfort, aesthetics, and advanced technologies.
about.description2: Our goal is to build not just homes, but a way of life. We make dreams of thousands of families come true, ensuring quality, reliability, and innovation.

timeline.2005: Construction of the first residential complex "Ariston"
timeline.2020: Launch of the flagship project SKYLINE
timeline.2023: Implementation of digital twins in development

newsPage.heroSubtitle: Stay informed with the latest events and news from our company.

0.title: Opening of a New Residential Complex
0.description: We proudly announce the opening of our new residential complex in the city center. Modern living conditions and infrastructure for a comfortable life.

1.title: Gift Giveaway Among Clients
1.description: We held a prize draw among our clients in honor of the company's anniversary. Congratulations to the winners!

2.title: New Mortgage Opportunities
2.description: We offer updated mortgage terms with a low interest rate and flexible repayment options.

3.title: Construction of a New District Begins
3.description: Construction has begun on a new residential district with parks, schools, and shops within walking distance.

4.title: Interview with the CEO
4.description: Our CEO shared insights into future projects, company values, and development priorities.

5.title: Courtyard Landscaping Completed
5.description: Several residential complexes have completed landscaping with benches, greenery, and children's playgrounds.

6.title: Partnership with Design Studio
6.description: A cooperation agreement has been signed with a leading architecture studio to create unique facades.

7.title: Best Residential Project Award
7.description: Our complex was recognized as the best residential project of the year by the National Construction Association.

8.title: Launch of Riverside Residential Complex
8.description: A grand opening of a new riverside residential complex with panoramic river views took place.

9.title: New Sales Office Opened
9.description: A new modern sales office has been opened for the convenience of our clients and partners.

10.title: Holiday Apartment Promotion
10.description: To celebrate the New Year, we are offering special discounts and bonuses for apartment purchases.

11.title: Bridge Construction Completed
11.description: Construction of a new transport bridge connecting the district to the city center has been completed.
